body:
Comment 10: 
Making the check at runtime doesn't work for a cross-compiler.  The call of uname in
cmd/dist is already rather dubious.

The right fix would be to make two different OS X distributions: one built on 10.6, one
built on 10.7.  Since on 10.8 we now default to clang we might even have to consider
making three different OS X distributions.
